Name: sprint_within_dates
Description: Sprints must have valid date range

Name: sprint_end_after_start
Description: Sprint end date must be after start

Name: stories_have_acceptance_criteria
Description: User stories must include acceptance criteria

Name: stories_within_priority_bounds
Description: User story priority within agreed range

Name: tasks_have_type
Description: Tasks must have an assigned type

Name: blockers_resolved_before_done
Description: Tasks cannot be done while blocked

Name: team_size_capacity_check
Description: Team size must support planned workload

Name: sprint_backlog_effort_limit
Description: Sprint backlog total effort under capacity

Name: release_plan_has_status
Description: Release plan must have valid status

Name: deployment_target_allowed
Description: Snapshot deployment target must be permitted

Name: velocity_reference_team
Description: Velocity must refer to one team

Name: product_backlog_is_active
Description: Product backlog must be in active status
